title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: #1-2 & Do-It-Yourself Book
description: Read the first two books, and then create your own wimpy journal! Includes three books: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: A Novel in Cartoons, Diary of a Wimpy Kid 2: Rodrick Rules, and Diary of a Wimpy Kid Do-It-Yourself Book.Number of pages: 224 pages each
author: Jeff Kinney
